discussion.p: Instantiations of the class template complex<> have to be allowed for integral types, to reflect existing practice and ISO standards (LIA-III).

blockquote.p: Moved to NAD Future. Rationale added.

discussion.p: SG6 suggests this issue is a new feature, not a problem with the existing standard, and should therefore be closed NAD. However, SG6 invites papers that bring the proposal up to date with the current standard.

rationale.p: There is no consensus for making this change at this time.
